content_descriptors.notes:
There are some "Sex scenes" which are shown like the TV series "The Americans" - other than that, this is not a porn game.

All the sexual content will be veiled and will be tastefully censored or simply implied.

Currently the game has a scene where character are spying on a another characters during her intimate moments where sexual acts are happening, their butts are side breasts are visible but no penetration and frontal nudity.

Another where the MC will have to interview victims of abuse.

The main characters can get into a romantic relationship which can be deemed "incestuous" - it's purely by choice, nothing's forced - like game of thrones.
